Parser

Class Transition

  • java.lang.Object
    • Parser.Transition

  • public class Transition
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a state transition for the Turing Machine. A state transition consists of the symbol read, the symbol to write, the direction to move the read/write head, and the state to transition to. It may also contain a tape index for which tape to switch to.
